name: Orchids
tagline: The AI Full Stack Engineer
description: Build apps and websites by chatting with an AI Full Stack Engineer

name: Replyke
tagline: APIs for user content, social graphs, and moderation tools
description: Re-launching as fully open-source under Apache 2.0, with an improved state-management architecture, and new components, such as Threaded Comments - advanced comment section featuring Reddit-style threaded discussions. Quality, speed & built-in moderation.

name: Plane
tagline: AI-native project management
description: Plane brings your entire org into one workspace where every team is equipped to do their best work, their way. Whether you're tracking projects, writing docs, or using AI to figure work out, it's all right here.

name: Traycer AI
tagline: Plan-first AI coding for real codebases
description: Traycer helps devs plan-first, code-faster with spec‚Äëdriven development. It breaks down high-level intents into structured plans, hands off to your favorite AI agent, then verifies changes so your large codebase stays solid.

name: Trupeer: Knowledge Base with AI Search
tagline: Your knowledge hub, with AI video search.
description: Knowledge base with AI video search. Ask questions, get timestamped answers from your videos and docs instantly. Drag-and-drop builder, auto-indexing, custom domain hosting. Built for teams tired of digging through drives and recordings.

name: Bloxie
tagline: Regain control over your life
description: I have zero self-control and I‚Äôm addicted to my phone. I built Bloxie because I needed it‚Äîa simple way to lock myself out of Instagram, TikTok, and other distractions.

name: SigmaMind AI
tagline: Build enterprise-ready voice/chat AI agents
description: SigmaMind AI (YC-backed) is a conversational AI platform to build voice and chat AI agents. Build with our no-code agent builder or plug in APIs. Prebuilt integrations + support for custom tools = fast, flexible deployment across industries.

name: Celaro
tagline: The Creative Project Tracker
description: The fastest, most enjoyable way for creative teams to plan, track, and forecast work. Minimal, fast, keyboard-friendly, and distraction-free.

name: InputLock
tagline: Lock your input method(IME) on macOS
description: Tired of macOS constantly changing your input method? InputLock locks your preferred input source and automatically restores it whenever it changes.

name: SalesEcho
tagline: Real-time AI Sales Call Assistant üìû
description: SalesEcho is your real-time sales co-pilot ‚Äî researching before the call, guiding you during it, and capturing insights after it.

name: MCP360
tagline: App Store for AI Agents
description: MCP360 is the App Store for AI agents‚Äîinstantly equip your AI with 100+ tools via a single ready to use MCP Platform. Supercharge AI Workflows, unlock new capabilities‚Äîall with effortless setup and one unified platform.

name: LIUPAG
tagline: LIUPAG - Admin panel for your website
description: LIUPAG is a professional HTML page and file editor, a convenient admin panel for your website. Content management, file manager, CMS for Landing Pages or HTML sites. For webmasters, developers, and website owners.

name: SoraPrompts
tagline: Discover and share the best Sora 2 AI video prompts
description: Sora Prompt Library is a community-driven hub for discovering, sharing, and saving the best prompts for OpenAI‚Äôs Sora 2 video generator. Browse curated prompts with previews, filter by style, bookmark favorites, and share your own!

name: myNeutron
tagline: Portable memory that follows you across AI chats.
description: Lose context between AI chats and LLMs? myNeutron gives you portable AI memory: capture from the web, Gmail, and Drive, search semantically, then drop the right context into any model in one click or through our MCP.

name: Analyzer
tagline: Crypto trading analysis on Autopilot

name: Broken link checker
tagline: Check broken links on any website in seconds
description: Broken Link Checker scans any webpage to find and highlight dead links. Detect 404 errors, missing redirects, or outdated URLs instantly ‚Äî and export results to CSV. Works fully in your browser, no data collected or sent anywhere.

name: GenZai
tagline: Prompt To Product
description: GenZai is the ultimate AI-powered development platform for Gen Z developers. Transform your ideas into production-ready websites with just a prompt. Experience vibe coding with instant code generation, live preview, and one-click deployment.

name: Overcast
tagline: Stop Hunting Logs to solve Issues in Production
description: AI-powered incident response platform that contextually correlates logs, metrics, and deployments to provide root cause analysis and reduce MTTR for SRE teams and startup teams alike. Focus more on building your dream application than fighting fires!
